title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Companion Animal Comparative Consultation Education: From Basics to Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain symptoms and treatments of major pet diseases (diabetes, arthritis, etc.) with 90% accuracy
Learners can deliver medication instructions to pet owners with an 85% or higher success rate in case-based simulations
Learners can complete a Comparative Disease Consultation Sheet (CIS) for companion animals through group activities and receive peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
